title: Changing a User Name  · Angelo State University
description: Update your account name easily at Angelo State University through our secure network portal and ensure your personal information reflects changes promptly.

headings: Information on Changing Your Technology Access Account User Name
paragraphs: Due to the way that some of the systems work, you will notice changes, and in some cases, might lose settings and preferences. Below is a list of items that a user name change are known to impact. There may be other issues that you encounter that cannot be foreseen. It is important to remember that some of these changes will be irreversible. Due to the number of systems on campus that use a User name based on your last name, it will be your responsibility to contact and change your information as noted for some systems. Depending on your role at the University, many of these may not apply to you.
Studentsneed to follow the process with theOffice of the Registrarto change their name.
Faculty/Staffto follow the process with theOffice of Human Resourcesto change their name.
Youmustgo through their office to make any name change official, and name changes will not be processed until their processes have been completed.
All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.

BannerPassword is reset.Fields with information pre-populated (as from last time using screen) might be lost.
Fields with information pre-populated (as from last time using screen) might be lost.
RamPortThere are no known issues with changing user name in RamPort.
There are no known issues with changing user name in RamPort.
EmailYour old email account will remain active, so you will continue to receive mail from it.Any clients checking email must be updated to have new email user name (Outlook, Apple Mail, etc.).
Your old email account will remain active, so you will continue to receive mail from it.
Any clients checking email must be updated to have new email user name (Outlook, Apple Mail, etc.).
Active DirectoryNote: on next logon to computer and/or VPN, the saved User Name may still be the older User Name and must be changed by the user when logging in.
Note: on next logon to computer and/or VPN, the saved User Name may still be the older User Name and must be changed by the user when logging in.

BlackboardSynchronization scheduling to Blackboard dictates that username changes may take up to eight hours to take effect in Blackboard. Blackboard will be inaccessible while waiting for the synchronization to occur after the username has been changed.

Synchronization scheduling to Blackboard dictates that username changes may take up to eight hours to take effect in Blackboard. Blackboard will be inaccessible while waiting for the synchronization to occur after the username has been changed.
FAMIS self-serviceUser Name for FAMIS self-service must be updated by FAMIS administrator in Facilities Management department.
User Name for FAMIS self-service must be updated by FAMIS administrator in Facilities Management department.
FAMISFacilities Management employees using FAMIS must contact FAMIS administrator to update their User Name.
Facilities Management employees using FAMIS must contact FAMIS administrator to update their User Name.
EMS UsersUser Name will not match EMS User Name - Must contact UC or Alumni administrator to update User Name

WorkstationOpen a Technology Service Center request to change name of computer to match new User Name.
Open a Technology Service Center request to change name of computer to match new User Name.
CashnetUser Name will not match cashnet.com User Name – Open a Technology Service Center work request to update.
User Name will not match cashnet.com User Name – Open a Technology Service Center work request to update.
Document Imaging SystemThe document imaging system will be unavailable until the next business day.
The document imaging system will be unavailable until the next business day.
Library EmployeesUser name will not match Voyager User Name – Library employees make a request to your supervisor to change name.
User name will not match Voyager User Name – Library employees make a request to your supervisor to change name.
SalesForce CRMUser name will not match SalesForce Username – Contact the person in charge of your SalesForce system to update the username.
